attributes.action: Object to Building of 100 houses on green belt land in Westwood / Jacksdale
attributes.background: Object to V/2021/0043 development of 100 houses to be built on green belt land in a small village in Nottinghamshire . There are no exceptional or special circumstances for this development. The area is a known Flood Plain. Main Road over the past year has been at times unpassable.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
